about_the_game:
Simil


Relax with Simil, the puzzle game that blends color, strategy, and tranquility. Connect matching color squares on an ever-changing grid, using a dynamic selector to shape your path. Navigate empty spaces and challenge your mind with increasingly intriguing levels. With a calm pace and vibrant design, Simil is your breath of fresh air amidst the everyday routine. Discover serenity in each connection and immerse yourself in an oasis of relaxation and quiet entertainment.

Main Features


  • Over 50 levels.
  • Easy and accessible gameplay mechanics.
  • Clean graphics and vibrant colors.
  • Relaxing yet challenging game, perfect for de-stressing.
  • Regular updates with new levels and challenges.

Whether you're seeking a tranquil but challenging brain workout or just looking to pass the time in a productive manner, Simil is the perfect choice.
